thread.section_title: Soundstore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Soundstore | www.soundstore.ie
thread.title: customer

author: customer
title: customer
text:
Bought a tumble dryer on a friday afternoon through their website and Soundstore called me literally 15 minutes later to arrange a time and date for delivery. The unit was delivered on saturday morning! not even 24 hours before i bought it!!!
The price was excellent and they had an offer for free delivery, so it was cheaper than currys or harvey norman.
I must say i was really impressed with the prompt service. I just hope that if anything goes wrong that they respond in the same way.
I usually buy local so I'm a bit sceptical when it comes to these type of big shops where they try to avoid helping you if there's a problem but so far i'm a happy customer.
I would recommend soundstore for the shopping and delivery service.
